title: PROMETHEUS (Industrial Sci-Fi Loops)
description: PROMETHEUS is a Industrial Sci-Fi asset pack featuring 10 level design cues/Compositions & 1 Full length composed cinematic 'Trailer Track' ( HACHIMAN )
longDescription:
PROMETHEUS PRODUCT OVERVIEW


Professional Film & Tv Composer Jordan Caygill who has had Movie & TV placements in Terminator Dark Fate, The Outsider, America's Got Talent & WWE Smackdown, WWE Smackdown RAW composed 'HACHIMAN' for game developers who are ready to take their games to the next level & use his unique approach to film score within their game trailers, visual cinematic cut scenes & much much more.


PROMETHEUS features compositional values such as: powerful percussion, heavy bass synths, pulsing rhythms & guitar riffs.


LISTEN TO PROMETHEUS HERE : https://soundcloud.com/jordan-caygill/prometheus-soundcloud/s-2AmHq7vsYQU


WATCH HOW Jordan Caygill COMPOSED HACHIMAN ( INTRODUCTION TO TRAILER MUSIC ) https://youtu.be/4SvaC149hag


PURCHASES & FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS

  • When You Buy our products they are formatted in WAV audio files. Customers have enquired about other formats such as MP3 to which are not available.
  • All Music is downloaded directly from the UNREAL ASSET STORE after Purchase.
  • When we submit to UNREAL ENGINE MARKETPLACE our products are packaged as WAV/CUE
  • See TECHNICAL INFORMATION for more details about our products before buying.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  10 Looped compositions
  •  1 Bonus trailer track 'HACHIMAN'
  •  High Quality Industry sampled instrumentation

Number of Audio Wavs: 11

Number of Audio Cues: 11

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz / 16 Bit

Does music loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 46 minutes 10 seconds

Supported Development Platforms: All

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes

Documentation: https://soundcloud.com/jordan-caygill/prometheus-soundcloud/s-2AmHq7vsYQU


Important/Additional Notes: Please Email us for customer enquires & additional questions related to our products @ cerberus_audio@outlook.com
